implicitMods: +21 Life gained for each Enemy hit by Attacks

8% increased Spell Damage per 5% Block Chance

Speak softly, lest their reason fend you.
Cut gently, lest their spirit haunt you.

explicitMods: Can Summon up to 1 Golem at a time
Golems grant 4% additional Physical Damage Reduction
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: When we free ourselves from the shackles
of civilised existence
we learn to feed and run and breathe
as the First Ones have always done.
- The Wolven King

implicitMods: 50% of Fire Damage taken as Cold Damage
flavourText: The first ones live where they can, where they must.
They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.
Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,
living with time and happenstance, as must we.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dire Braid
implicitMods: 5% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
flavourText: From flesh and ferocity,
the First Ones roamed
through the realm of Spirit,
and into the darkness beyond.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Victory Gorget
explicitMods: Adds 9 to 20 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks
flavourText: It's said to be noble to stand one's ground.
To soak the earth in stalwart blood.
While the First Ones chose to laugh and run
and caper with untamed glee.
- The Wolven King

items.typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Scintillating Primal Skull Talisman of the Kiln
flavourText: With the will of the first ones in our sinews
we shall tear down the walls of Sarn.
Yet as is the way of the wildlands,
Only the strong may grow stronger.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Asenath's Mark
flavourText: Asenath's mind was as quick and nimble
as the fingers that drew her bowstring.
The Empire hides lies and falsehoods
Behind a mask of politeness and civility.
The First Ones teach us to look through the lies,
And that no beast can truly cover their tracks.
- The Wolven King

items.typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Magpie's Three Hands Talisman of the Augur
implicitMods: Gain 11% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element
flavourText: We breed thoughts of single mind,
fashion tools of single purpose.
While the First Ones bring to bear
anything that the wildlands provide.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dire Locket
flavourText: The Hunter faced the First One
and notched his final arrow.
The First One bared its fangs
and savoured its final breath.
- The Wolven King
With the will of the first ones in our sinews
we shall tear down the walls of Sarn.
Yet as is the way of the wildlands,
Only the strong may grow stronger.
- The Wolven King

items.typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dauntless Three Hands Talisman of the Heavens
implicitMods: Gain 9% of Physical Damage as Extra Damage of a random Element
flavourText: We breed thoughts of single mind,
fashion tools of single purpose.
While the First Ones bring to bear
anything that the wildlands provide.
- The Wolven King
The First Ones are the forever ones.
There is no dust of the hourglass in their blood.
No fissures of weariness in their faces.
To drink of their blood is to drink of time itself.
- The Wolven King
The First Ones are the forever ones.
There is no dust of the hourglass in their blood.
No fissures of weariness in their faces.
To drink of their blood is to drink of time itself.
- The Wolven King
Death met with the First Ones
and demanded they hunt with mercy.
For while pain might delight the mind,
it does not fill the belly.
- The Wolven King
The first ones marked their hunting grounds
with blood and piss.
We have tried to paint our future in words.
Now we shall paint with inks of savagery.
- The Wolven King

flavourText: You can change your name, but you cannot change your history.
<size:27>{God had forsaken the land
And Victario wept.
Corruption consumed the land
And Victario's tears turned to blood.}
<size:31>{The Eternals lauded his valour. The Karui relished his defeat. Yet the final thoughts of Marceus Lioneye were naught but lament for his pride.}
I've never come upon a ship I could not command. I have however met sailors that were not willing to be led.
The thumb turns down
and the crowd roars,
they want death
and the blood is yours.
"This one? It is NOT for sale. You would sooner pry it from my lifeless hand."
- Jonfé Darontos, Ringmaker

<size:25>{"To know for what you fight. To get up again when you've been struck down. To outmanoeuvre someone faster, trick someone smarter, crush someone stronger. That's what it takes to claim the crown."
- Daresso, the King of Swords}
A taste of power brings a hunger for more.
Turn the crank,
close your eyes,
and pray to the gods
for a pleasant surprise.
"He might be lacking in vision, but his virtuosity is undeniable."
- Malachai, on Maligaro

items.secDescrText: Must support both a skill that hits enemies, and a curse skill to work. The curse will be applied when enemies are hit by the other skill. Cannot support totems, traps, or mines. Minions cannot apply curses this way.
explicitMods: Supported Skills apply supported Curses on Hit
Supported Skills have 14% reduced Curse Duration
items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: Sturdy and strong,
grown from the stream.
The Flora that live here,
A combatant's dream.

items.secDescrText: Channel ice through your hands, adding cold damage to spells and attacks. If you shatter an enemy, they explode and deal AoE cold damage to enemies near them.
explicitMods: Adds 28 to 42 Cold Damage to Attacks
Adds 28 to 42 Cold Damage to Spells
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: The finer the brew, the harder it is to remember drinking it.
"Only after one forsakes rage, can true power be found."
- Sekhema Asenath
<size:31>{A month's work, a year's wages, a foolish shortcut through a Rhoa's nest, and a grieving bride-to-be, who never received her betrothed's great gift.}

items.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: 1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: <size:26>{At the beck and call
of The Siren's hand,
winter ravages
the trembling land,
and the weight of ice that binds
will break the strongest of minds.}
A tower built of the strongest stone is not eternal; a towering intellect is not enlightened.
No matter where your dreams take you, Nightmare follows close behind.
Chaos spread, wreaking havoc and death. They said none would be spared, and yet here I stand.
Two sides of a coin;
Heads for a friend,
tails a foe;
Gemini toss up
<smaller>{They fought the storm together as one,
Until the longest of days was done.
Their love grew stronger
with every breath,
Until it was broken apart in death.}
Loyalty can be bought. Just make sure you know who the buyer is.

items.secDescrText: Supports projectile skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 31% less Projectile Damage
items.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Active Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb
The earth offers nourishment, growth and healing. Unless, of course, the sky has other plans.

items.descrText: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy.

upon hooves of grey and black.
The people felt their stamping rage
and cowered as the fury rained down.
- The Wolven King
<size:28>{Scaly beast of the skies,
watching with his golden eyes.
Shadow that blocks out the sun,
it's too late for you to run.}

between two sharpened blades.
That should we stray too far from the path,

- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Golem Heart
flavourText: For too long we have crawled in darkness,
scavenging through rotten scraps.
The First Ones teach us to scavenge until we can hunt,
and then never crawl again.
- The Wolven King
Upon seeing her face, I am terrified—the moon shows me my own form!

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Brimstone Scarab
flavourText: For too long we have crawled in darkness,
scavenging through rotten scraps.
The First Ones teach us to scavenge until we can hunt,
and then never crawl again.
- The Wolven King
By the time their eyes meet,
the dark deal has long since been made,
and his fate long since sealed.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Armageddon Medallion
explicitMods: Adds 2 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The First Ones stalk with us
upon this lifelong hunt,
and cast their contempt
upon those that would make us their prey.
- The Wolven King
"No man can best me, no demon can fell me. For I vanquish all with my axe!"
It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.
They say it is the head that leads, but all must flow through the body at some point.
"Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."
- Maligaro

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bramble Scarab
flavourText: The First Ones stalk with us
upon this lifelong hunt,
and cast their contempt
upon those that would make us their prey.
- The Wolven King
"I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."

items.secDescrText: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay.
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: "Masters of wit, strength and cunning. To survive the harsh winters, you must be like the fox."
- Ezomyte Proverb
"Don't worry, I know what I'm doing."
- Toggo's Last Words
<size:29>{"I swore to use my position to help the people. What good is power when it just accumulates on the already-powerful?" - Erasmus, Imperial Gemcutter}

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Maelström Heart
explicitMods: Adds 14 to 24 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The Empire poisons our blood with sweet wine.
Poisons our flesh with silk.
Poisons our minds with civil lies.
Poisons our children with servitude.
- The Wolven King
"I don't believe in karma. If it were real, I would never win."
The path to godhood is guided by the hand of sacrifice.
"Axes and mauls are so uncivilised. A good clean cut to the neck with a sharp blade, that's the Sarn way!"
<size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night
Chaos reigned
Where the shards fell
All was destroyed
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}
Primed, curved and sleek.
Decisive and final.
For malice and righteousness.
There's but one solution.
The house always wins.
From death, life.
From life, death.
The wheel turns,
and the corbies wheel overhead.
To her beauty you submit,
lest your neck the great Queen slit.
Bound by fate,
inseparable by choice.
The house always wins.
Primed, curved and sleek.
Decisive and final.
For malice and righteousness.
There's but one solution.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Rage Locket
flavourText: 'Sleep when you are weary,' our mothers told us.
'Sleep when you are dead,' our fathers told us.
To the First Ones, the slumbering and the corpse
are one and the same.
- The Wolven King
"Experiment 22A: Rhoas, when deprived of water, secrete a most delightfully potent toxin."
- Maligaro

items.secDescrText: Creates a wall of ice which holds back enemies. Targets under the wall are damaged and pushed back.
explicitMods: 0.2 seconds between appearance of Wall sections
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

flavourText: Nature was her domain,
Love was her song,
Family was her devotion,
Knowledge was her gift.
The house always wins.
Unlimited power is apt to corrupt the minds of those who possess it.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dire Idol
explicitMods: Adds 7 to 14 Physical Damage to Attacks
Adds 1 to 2 Fire Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The civilised man must wrestle
with the demands of heart and mind.
The First Ones share no such struggle.
For their Spirit is swift and deadly certain.
- The Wolven King
It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.
Simple actions can lead the world to an early grave.
The hermit's only friend is the greenery he can find.
Whoever said 'more is always better' has obviously never met a rat.
It is with the smallest of words that we find the largest of truths.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wrath Pendant
implicitMods: 50% of Lightning Damage taken as Cold Damage
explicitMods: Adds 3 to 4 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The first ones live where they can, where they must.

Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,
living with time and happenstance, as must we.
- The Wolven King
Exploring lands made of flesh and sorrow, we'll reap and plunder like there's no tomorrow.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Entropy Torc
flavourText: The First Ones hold us
between two sharpened blades.
That should we stray too far from the path,
we find ourselves severed.
- The Wolven King
The house always wins.

"Hold your tongue before I claim it." - Doedre Darktongue

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Blood Pendant
explicitMods: Adds 7 to 12 Cold Damage to Attacks

Jump right in,
But beware
Of things broken
Or beyond compare.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Woe Torc
flavourText: For too long we have crawled in darkness,

- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Vengeance Charm
explicitMods: Adds 8 to 18 Cold Damage to Attacks
flavourText: I stood among the stones

- The Wolven King
<size:31>{Sometimes an apprentice becomes a master through countless hours of hard work and practice.
Sometimes it happens by force.}
<size:27>{Fire filled the sky that night
Chaos reigned
Where the shards fell
All was destroyed
-Jozen Kasigi, retelling an urban legend of the Cataclysm}
The house always wins.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chimeric Clasp

flavourText: The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

explicitMods: +1 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems

explicitMods: Adds 5 to 15 Physical Damage to Attacks

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>The Three Dragons
explicitMods: Your Fire Damage can Shock but not Ignite
Your Cold Damage can Ignite but not Freeze or Chill
Your Lightning Damage can Freeze but not Shock
flavourText: "The ice seared his naked feet
As the lightning stilled his heart,
But it was the flames upon his lover's face
That roused him to vengeance."
- From 'The Three Dragons' by Victario of Sarn

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Zahndethus' Cassock
explicitMods: Adds 1 to 40 Lightning Damage to Attacks
100% chance on Block to create Consecrated Ground
flavourText: When dead men rise and darkness falls
Only faith can be your walls

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Queen's Decree
flavourText: The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

12% increased Lightning Damage per Frenzy Charge

flavourText: "Hyaon the 'Red Wolf'
Howling mad
Cloaked in blood
A banner to his legion
A terror to his foes."
- Garivaldi, Chronicler to the Empire

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Bones of Ullr

Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Mana Leech

Forsake hope

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Perandus Blazon

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Heartbreaker

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Eclipse Solaris

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Black Sun Crest

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Wideswing

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Shavronne's Pace

explicitMods: Reflects 15 Fire Damage to Melee Attackers

explicitMods: 60% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells

flavourText: With the will of the first ones in our sinews
we shall tear down the walls of Sarn.
Yet as is the way of the wildlands,
Only the strong may grow stronger.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Corpse Choker
flavourText: The first ones marked their hunting grounds
with blood and piss.
We have tried to paint our future in words.
Now we shall paint with inks of savagery.
- The Wolven King

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

flavourText: The Hunter faced the First One
and notched his final arrow.
The First One bared its fangs
and savoured its final breath.
- The Wolven King

explicitMods: Adds 5 to 11 Fire Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The Hunter faced the First One
and notched his final arrow.
The First One bared its fangs

implicitMods: 50% of Cold Damage taken as Fire Damage
flavourText: The first ones live where they can, where they must.
They embrace the frost, the storm, the drought.
Waxing and waning, breaking and mending,
living with time and happenstance, as must we.
- The Wolven King

explicitMods: Adds 4 to 7 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: The First Ones are the forever ones.
There is no dust of the hourglass in their blood.
No fissures of weariness in their faces.
To drink of their blood is to drink of time itself.
- The Wolven King
With the will of the first ones in our sinews
we shall tear down the walls of Sarn.
Yet as is the way of the wildlands,
Only the strong may grow stronger.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Phoenix Spike
explicitMods: Adds 7 to 15 Fire Damage to Attacks

flavourText: The wolf greeted the king,
In the light of the harvest moon.
The wolf offered the strength of the wild,
And the king paid for it in blood.
The world of the First Ones is harsh;
We struggle on our bellies to survive.
But that which imprisons us also changes us
And soon we will emerge anew.
- The Wolven King

items.typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Sorcerer's Deep One Talisman of the Newt
flavourText: We have basked in the cloying warmth of servitude.
Now the First Ones harden us
against the numbing chill of despair
so that freedom will not slip through our trembling fingers.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Heartbound Loop
explicitMods: Minions have 10% increased Area of Effect
350 Physical Damage taken on Minion Death
flavourText: When the axe finally fell, Seryl shared his pain,
and the last thought that flickered through his
fading mind was her broken, shattered scream.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Dragon Smasher
explicitMods: 34% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

items.typeLine: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Razor-sharp Spinefuse Talisman of the Polar Bear
explicitMods: Adds 10 to 16 Physical Damage to Attacks
flavourText: We Ezomytes are beasts of burden
bearing wealth of an empire on our backs,
growing lean and strong
while our masters grow fat and weak.
- The Wolven King

implicitMods: 4% chance to Freeze, Shock and Ignite
flavourText: From flesh and ferocity,
the First Ones roamed
through the realm of Spirit,
and into the darkness beyond.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Oblivion Noose
flavourText: For too long we have crawled in darkness,
scavenging through rotten scraps.
The First Ones teach us to scavenge until we can hunt,
and then never crawl again.
- The Wolven King
When we free ourselves from the shackles
of civilised existence
we learn to feed and run and breathe
as the First Ones have always done.
- The Wolven King

implicitMods: 10% chance to gain an Endurance Charge on Kill
flavourText: Look not upon me with fear, my men.
Though I seem strange, even monstrous,
were you to see with the eyes of your forebears,
your hearts would be filled with wonder.
- The Wolven King
The First Ones are the forever ones.
There is no dust of the hourglass in their blood.
No fissures of weariness in their faces.
To drink of their blood is to drink of time itself.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Victory Clasp
flavourText: The world of the First Ones is harsh;
We struggle on our bellies to survive.
But that which imprisons us also changes us
And soon we will emerge anew.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Chimeric Crack
explicitMods: Adds 47 to 83 Fire Damage to Spells

flavourText: 'Sleep when you are weary,' our mothers told us.
'Sleep when you are dead,' our fathers told us.
To the First Ones, the slumbering and the corpse
are one and the same.
- The Wolven King
We Ezomytes are beasts of burden
bearing wealth of an empire on our backs,
growing lean and strong
while our masters grow fat and weak.
- The Wolven King

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Queen's Decree
flavourText: The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

items.name: <<set:MS>><<set:M>><<set:S>>Reverberation Rod
explicitMods: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Spell Echo
flavourText: If it's worth doing once, it's worth doing twice.
The world of the First Ones is harsh;
We struggle on our bellies to survive.
But that which imprisons us also changes us
And soon we will emerge anew.

items.secDescrText: Infuses your melee weapon with electrical energies as you swing. In addition to converting some of your physical damage to lightning damage, the stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as you strike, flying out behind your target to hit farther-away enemies. The projectiles cannot miss if the melee attack hit its target.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Damage over time caused by Projectiles deals 25% less Damage
items.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies.
